tool.name: OGS: createQuadraticMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'createQuadraticMesh'.
tool.command: for i in $input_mesh_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; createQuadraticMesh --input-mesh-file '$input_mesh_file.element_identifier' $add_centre_node --output-mesh-file output_1.vtu
tool.help: This tool runs the **createQuadraticMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
